title: Can Big Tech’s layoffs help mitigate climate change?
description: Layoffs are ravaging Big Tech, and it’s creating an unexpected boon for certain climate firms.

title: Online mobs are now coming for student journalists
description: The experience of an Arizona student journalist highlights the growing threat that online harassment poses to journalists, especially those just starting out.

title: A diminished Twitter faces a World Cup test for hate speech moderation
description: Advocates warn that chaos within Twitter could worsen the spread of hate speech during the tournament.
